website_summaries.verdict: A versatile stand that works great for travel and folds up nicely for storage.
pros: Fast and easy assembly and compact storage with telescoping legs
Can double as a saw horse in a hurry
Height is perfect for most users
cons: No supports included for longer boards
Setting up the brackets initially can be tricky, as included hardware doesn’t fit all miter saws

customer_reviews.title: How to turn 2 saw horses into one great work table.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding stabilitty, lite, easy to carry, my second generation of this table/work station.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harkins

customer_reviews.title: You can start using your barrels as barrels again.
customer_reviews.text: I never got excited over a saw horse before but Dewalt engineers hit it out of the park with these. They fold up, nest together have built in handles and are light but most importantly they are strong like bull ! You can mount your miter saw on them, they have a v notch on both ends to hold round stock like pipe or dowels in place while cutting . These saw horses are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: Read if you want to make an informed decision.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy yet lightweight. However, the washers that came with the bolts to attach the miter saw to the brackets were too small for the hole in my miter saw meaning the washer just fell in the hole, but, this is a $1 fix go to a hardware store buy the right size washer and your done. This stand is a workhorse, quality craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: GrRecrot

customer_reviews.title: great tool... YET...
customer_reviews.text: Love the potability, Yet it does not adapt to all of the optional accessorizes that DeWalt has for the other Work Stands, I have made some custom mods to allow the use of the other accessories, one day I might post the photos. other than that worth it as I use it with the DWS780 Miter Saw and the Table saw DWE7491RS, I cut a lot of large sections of lumber.
customer_reviews.author: Dean VT

customer_reviews.title: Good but can be better
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present along with a compound miter double bevel saw. The stand has no wheels like other models and does not have extensions - those are accessories and from my research they do not store with the stand. I am manufacturing my own “stand-wheels” that will allow me to move it around and secure it for use when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Bethzaida Crespo

customer_reviews.title: Does Its Job
customer_reviews.text: When I removed this from the box, I was a bit skeptical about how well it would hold up under my 12 in. DEWALT Miter saw, The stand is lightweight and portable (complete with a carrying handle) when folded. I was pleasantly surprised when my husband and I had the saw mounted in a couple of minutes! I had no concerns while cutting boards for our latest DIY project!
customer_reviews.author: lnm801

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bracket that clips onto stand broke in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Sabinson

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt working great with Ryobi miter saw
customer_reviews.text: After rebate got it for $89! Easy setup. Did not have to use plywood to mount this (as recommended by Dewalt's user manual). I mounted my Ryobi saw directly to the Dewalt clamps with the bolts, washers and split-washers provided by Dewalt. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small convenient and easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: This is simple and cute It does not have the side stands to hold long boards BUT it is so convenient and easy to carry and fit in your van and everything instead of that big stand (which I have for long pieces of wood) but when I do wood flooring I use it or other small cuts cause it is so convenient and if you have the large stand the saw supports are the same already so you don't need to change anything, just pic up your saw and put it on this stand instead.
customer_reviews.author: The Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: perfect engineering
customer_reviews.text: love everything about the designer who came up with this. light but sturdy, easy to collapse, and perfectly balanced handle to carry like a tool box. gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: cmmny

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very useful
customer_reviews.text: So I’m writing this for my husband. Based on how often he uses them, how he states these have been terrific I’m going to assume they are well made, easy to use, and well worth the purchase. You’re welcome Honey!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 inch
customer_reviews.text: love it. these saw stands pack to a slim size and locks down the saw for stability with my 10 inch sliding and 12 inch non sliding miter saws, I bought a separate pair of mounts for my other saw soi I wont have to change them over. nice upgrade for on the job craftsmen
customer_reviews.author: bar k

customer_reviews.title: Best chop saw mount that I can imagine. It is a very solid platform.
customer_reviews.text: Used this with my chop saw. It is very sturdy and does not wiggle or shake. I have a dealt chop saw, but any chop saw with standard mounting holes should work. Legs lock firmly and are solid. It folds up fairly small.
customer_reviews.author: D. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Seriously awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel this way about many purchases. I've worked in construction (not anymore), and have used everything from site built saw horses to newer folding ones, both metal and plastic. Everything about these is well thought out and designed to last. Heavy duty, carrying handles, and they clip together for easy transport and storage. The fact that they also come with an easy on/easy off bracket for my saw is icing on the cake. If you're in the market, these might be a little spendy, but are well worth the price. I'd do it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, sturdiest and easiest to fold/transport workhorse out there. I am in. the trades and now own 4 of these. When it comes to tools you get what you pay for. Can't beat these.
customer_reviews.author: Yonder

customer_reviews.title: Super Miter Saw Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid stand. The top rail has two locking tabs that will prevent the brackets from sliding when cutting. The brackets mount the top rail in short order with hand release brakes for quick and easy removal of your saw and they have rubber feet if you want to place your saw with the brackets attached on a workbench. I was able to bolt my Harbor Freight Chicago 10" Compound Miter Saw to the brackets in about 5 minutes. The stand legs fold up and lock for quick storage. The stand has a carry handle for easy transporting while the legs are stowed. Dewalt has made an excellent stand. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wolf

customer_reviews.title: PORTABLE BENCH
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE GREAT..IF YOU NEED A SAW SET UP THAT IS LIGHT OR A BENCH USING 2..THE ROCK..EASY RELIABLE SET UP. STRONG. VERY WELL BUILT
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Versatile, sturdy and well made. I can’t think of a Dewalt product I’ve purchased where I wasn’t able to make these same comments!
customer_reviews.author: Goodneighbor

customer_reviews.title: Saw feels safe
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot and it feels very well made and I don't regret buying it. Held up to a big job without batting an eye.
customer_reviews.author: Ogrejelly

customer_reviews.title: Another fantastic Dewalt product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have a Hitachi C12RSH and if you are familiar with this miter saw, you know it's a monster. This stand doesn't even flinch. Well made, light and very strong. Also, a very good value for a Dewalt product. Even though it does not have an extension (and no way to add it to this model), I solved that problem by purchasing an individual "roller support stand" from Sears which allows me to place the support anywhere on either side of the saw. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to set up and break down and them are ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these work stands and found them to be very handy in multiple applications. I use them in the shop and take them with me on jobs. They are easy to set up and break down and them are very sturdy. They also nest together to make them easy to transport. As pure saw horses they hold a lot of weight securely. You can even attach a two by four to the top as a sacrificial top when cutting or drilling. An excellent product. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for My Purposes
customer_reviews.text: I adapted it to my miter saw with a 1.5" plywood platform (2x 3/4" stock) - freed up more valuable workspace. The height, for me, was also an improvement. Wish I could add the outriggers to support longer pieces of wood.
customer_reviews.author: W. Coghlan

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Miter saw
customer_reviews.text: Was getting sick of trying to figure out where to put the saw, keeping if from getting knocked off...etc...Problem solved! If you have a miter saw...get this! You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: High quality - Good price
customer_reviews.text: I use this weekly for a miter saw stand. It is wonderful. I would purchase again. Recommend it highly. Great quality. Well designed.
customer_reviews.author: ZeightyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: A superb product.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew and he was beyond pleased! Couldn’t wait to use it to cut a laminate flooring and it performed above his expectations. I’m his favorite aunt now, I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for the money..
customer_reviews.text: Very well built.. Easy set up and take down.. Has no wheels to move around but you can manage to relocate assembled or just remove the saw with the quick release ..
customer_reviews.author: salvesg

customer_reviews.title: Can Dance on it
customer_reviews.text: A beast of a stand. It is a little heavy, but it is very secure
customer_reviews.author: John Abboreno

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, like most of DeWalt.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a Keter folding table. With the saw brackets I mounted a 3/4 pice of plywood. Works great very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: very well made
customer_reviews.text: very well made and priced right ,works great on milwaukee saws also
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Stand and brackets are great - sturdy and easy to mount. Would definitely buy again. One of the included fasteners failed during assembly, even when being conservative on torque. But picking up new ones from the local home improvement store was pretty cheap and easy.
customer_reviews.author: tamu06

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up to Dewalt miter saw and whole assembly was very sturdy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 3forfun

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my father, he seems to really like it
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Quality and a perfect matched to any miter saw.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is built with high quality and a perfect match for any Dewalt miter saw.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky V.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Decent price. Works well with my 12 inch DeWalt miter saw.
customer_reviews.author: harleydog37

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stand
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent and stand is well built and robust.
customer_reviews.author: R Barton

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and stronger than I thought. Good light product to move from job to job.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mckinley

customer_reviews.title: Stand by me
customer_reviews.text: It's Dewalt, what else to say ? I love the brackets that bolt to my saw, they have quick release handles to put on and remove from the stand. The legs fold up and a handle to carry stand around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for occasional use and stores easily. For long trim pieces you have set up ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for occasional use and stores easily. For long trim pieces you have set up other supports to accommodate / support the length.
customer_reviews.author: Kenton D Miller

customer_reviews.title: We attached a 2' x 4' piece of 9 ply plywood to the removable clamps and it is a very sturdy work surface
customer_reviews.text: We use this one for quick set-up for the chop saw and as a portable work bench. We attached a 2' x 4' piece of 9 ply plywood to the removable clamps and it is a very sturdy work surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Value and Function at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great portable workstation for my 10" Dewalt compound miter saw ... Just wish it came with an attachment/extension for a roll-bar or stand to keep the cutting surfaces and materials nice and level. Otherwise -- another great product from Dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt did it again
customer_reviews.text: This stand is one of the best additions you can buy if your second guessing yourself trust me just buy it. Its compact ,sturdy and is more then just a stand .
customer_reviews.author: mckenzie installation

customer_reviews.title: Good miter saw stand
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for a miter saw stand for a Dewalt miter saw (DW715) and have not used it as a sawhorse. For my uses it has worked well. It is lightweight but feels sturdy with the weight of the miter saw on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Galen

customer_reviews.title: Excatly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have very little storage space and pulling out the tools to do a project always was a pain in the neck especially the miter saw. With this work stand all I have to do is extend the legs, pop on the saw and I'm ready to go. The included mounting brackets worked perfectly with my 12" saw and when I'm done it breaks down just as fast and takes up very little storage space
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: It handles the weight
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a cut off saw with steel
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Block

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for mitre saw or you can also use ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for mitre saw or you can also use a couple of these for sawhorses. Very sturdy and they collapse easily for storage. I plan to buy another and toss my plastic collapsible saw horses.
customer_reviews.author: Shifty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Lightweight. Easy to assemble. With $25 off coupon I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: H.D. KWON

customer_reviews.title: A Real Work Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most versatile work stands available. Sturdy, collapsible, relatively light weight given material and the interlocking feature is a bonus. add the price break you can get when amazon has a DeWalt promotion and it's a steal! I would recommend this to everyone from the DIYer to the Professional .
customer_reviews.author: Chi-town MacDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and a Dewalt Mitre saw - very sturdy and works great with the saw. Easy set up and break down.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt miter saw stand
customer_reviews.text: Bought to put my dewalt miter saw on it. Sturdy. Expensive for a stand.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good stand, very portable and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Nice workstand, I first had the larger model of this for use with my saw, and I do love using that. I purchased this one and mounted plywood onto the removable mounts (2x4 foot 3/4 inch plywood) and it makes a handy extra work table that is reasonably easy to store when you are done. Have also used with my saw for smaller jobs and this works very well.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stand using with the 20v miter saw
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stand using with the 20v miter saw. Very sturdy for the price and convienent. I have no worries as of now. I will have this for many years I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: James N. Ard Jr.

customer_reviews.title: My Dewalt saw installed easily and this is a very sturdy platform
customer_reviews.text: Second one I purchased. My Dewalt saw installed easily and this is a very sturdy platform.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Dewalt saw
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Dewalt saw. The mount has a quick release for the saw which makes it a great saw horse too.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: of course it just looks good sitting in the middle of the room while everything ...
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly with the 10" miter saw, allowing for some light construction work without having to figure out where to put the saw every time you want to do some minor work around the house. ...of course it just looks good sitting in the middle of the room while everything around it is in form of disrepair.....
customer_reviews.author: Kanaka

customer_reviews.title: Solid support
customer_reviews.text: Holds my saw nicely, and quick set up, very portable.
customer_reviews.author: TrainTec

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for my chopsaws
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for my chopsaws. Really like the quick easy mounting for saws. Ordered another mount for another saw.
customer_reviews.author: TONY WOLKEN

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench for a DeWalt Saw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with a 12" saw as a gift. It seemed sturdy, well made, and solid and has turned out to be a good tool for my son. He particularly likes the fact that the saw base support clips have feet so the saw can be left on the base and used saving time in assembly and dis assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest H

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as a work table
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. I attached a thick fiberboard (18"x32") to the mounting brackets and bolted a small miter saw to the board which can be removed when not in use. I now have a nice table top work area at just the right height. I can do this because the stand is so solid. So far no problems and its good not to be working off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: FXP

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, not bulky, and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I had a different model that was awkward to move. This heavy duty model is a lot easier to move, and the under foot space is more with less trip zone when you are using a mitre saw.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lea

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, quick to setup
customer_reviews.text: Light, sturdy, quick to setup. I've got this and a jawhorse. I end up using this one most of the time. One thing I'd like to see are a couple clamp slots along the body instead of just the ends. I end up using clamps there more often than not.
customer_reviews.author: OCD_OBD

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: These things are SOLID! The saw clips are very functional and easy to attach. I love them,but i have to say if they made the feet with a few inches of adjustable extension so you could level on uneven ground these would be the ultimate/unbeatable workhorse period.
customer_reviews.author: DaBrun

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect. It would be nice to have extensions to hold long boards.
customer_reviews.author: Mee

customer_reviews.title: A work bench worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy work bench, and our dewalt miter saw bolted right on without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Blaise Michalchik

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand for DeWalt Miter Saw
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I needed it to do. Sturdy and doesn't shake or move while using.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Fink Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great table for small space
customer_reviews.text: Great table for small space, I have a small tool room this 36 stand is perfect. Very well designed and quality build. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: K Town 2k

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A well made product that just exudes strength and a great base for your saw!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Good little stand
customer_reviews.text: Good little stand. Has held up well on the job site and is easy to pack away in my trailer. Would buy it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Doneright

customer_reviews.title: Great saw mount
customer_reviews.text: Great saw mount. Excellent sturdy construction and collapses easily. Saw mount slides also very easy to use. Much better then messing around trying to find a safe place to use my saw.
customer_reviews.author: ymsmiley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it very strong to hold my dewalt table saw job site
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Super Saw Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and easy to use - and very easy to fold and store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent work stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand. This is a very sturdy stand and it's very well made. I've use it to build a fireplace and it does the job like it should. The supplied mounting bracket can be double as a platform to widen the surface of the stand. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Tsen

customer_reviews.title: No Extenders
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 if it would have had extenders on the ends for long cuts. It's my fault I should have checked before buying it. I've had no issues using it
customer_reviews.author: J.D.Texas

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Maybe a little pricey but is just the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Maybe a little pricey but is just the ticket for my new miter saw.
customer_reviews.author: Opio

customer_reviews.title: A MUST
customer_reviews.text: A must with your Miter saw.... Easy to handle and strong.
customer_reviews.author: willyb

customer_reviews.title: Miter Saw Stand
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I didn't buy one sooner. I already had roller stands, so this is all I needed. Since I'm a do-it-yourself person, I like the fact that I can fold it up and store it till the next project. Very sturdy and lightweight. My DeWalt saw fits right on it, but I am going to make a piece to accomodate my other saw, that I just use it for rough cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for, holds my compound miter saw and does not take up a lot of space in my limited space garage. Easy to set up and take down if you wish to take it to another site. Very sturdy and priced right. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daveg61

customer_reviews.title: It's good for what it is but consider the version that ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good for what it is but consider the version that has the extensions that hold the wood (or whatever you're cutting) level
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It is so easy to use and light. The only thing I wish I'd done differently is to get the table that has extenders on either side to hold long pieces of wood. I had to rig up a couple of garbage cans and a room mate to cut long boards
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Saw Horses
customer_reviews.text: If you want a great pair of saw horses this is the way to go! Not inexpensive but should last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Walter P.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile With Creative Options
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile, used it to make a router table base in the wood shop. Much easier and cheaper than making a bench and I can move it easily. I'm tall so it has the router at a very comfortable level with the table.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife

customer_reviews.title: Awesome saw stand.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. It's compact and holds my 7-1/4" compound miter saw perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wai

customer_reviews.title: Holds up my Bosch Dual Bevel Slide Miter Saw, ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds up my Bosch Dual Bevel Slide Miter Saw, and it folds up and sticks away in the corner when not in use. Uses up about a 4" square of garage space.
customer_reviews.author: Craig E Stuart

customer_reviews.title: its flawless
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this stand, meets all my work needs, and folds down for moving from job sight to shop!!! Plus it was a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: John Walker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stand/sawhorse
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stand. Light weight and very versatile. I liked my first one so much that I got a 2nd one to use as sawhorse. Much more compact than a sawhorse with legs folded.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: This works great, I keep my saw on it at all times, it is easy to remove the miter saw if you need to transport it. Folds up easy, is sturdy all around great stand for my saw.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Dennison

customer_reviews.title: I bought one of these for my son and now ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my son and now he bought one for me! I have not put mine together yet but he assures me it is a back saver! I need that at my age!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Dewalt miter saw and holds it securely. Use side stands for long boards.
customer_reviews.author: John Corona

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband wanted best price I could find.
customer_reviews.author: KSR

customer_reviews.title: very strong
customer_reviews.text: this work stand is very strong and well built. as others have pointed out you can put a miter saw on it but it is really best for a work stand. you will not be disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, saves space which is why i ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leary of quality at first but it is an excellent, well designed and built stand. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: James Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: works for any saw
customer_reviews.text: Use this with my ridgid saw and it is awesome. Has handles for easy carrying and the mounts were an easy install on to muy saw. It is super light and super sturdy. Love it
customer_reviews.author: fatbag

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Work Stand for Miter Saw is Strong and Light!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how strong and light this work stand is. It is portable, but I don't really intend to take it any where. I had thought it came with an extension arm, but it doesn't, so buy a different Dewalt model if you are looking for this.
customer_reviews.author: Sue A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy, real stable and works real well. Light weight and easy to handle and carry.
customer_reviews.author: NanaExtrodinaire

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for construction projects
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and useful beyond my expectations. The price is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: JLuhn

customer_reviews.title: Handy for the saw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a power miter saw and didn't want to fight using the saw and try to utilize a table top. Stand works well with saw. I don't know why I thought it had extensions on the ends for long lumber. I may have just got different items mixed up when I was shopping around.
customer_reviews.author: Lowgear57

customer_reviews.title: Great work stand for my DeWalt DW713
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous placing the order but was extremely satisfied when it arrived. It is very robust and stable yet folds up very neatly for storage. The manual will show a picture of a separate retaining clip used to prevent the saw from moving side to side during operation. There is no separate clip as this is built into the saw so you simply need to mount the saw to the far right on the stand and the bracket will slip nicely into the integrated clip. Comes with detailed instructions for DeWalt saws as well as instructions for mounting saws from other manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Super study, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Super study, easy to carry, and well designed for quick set up and take down. If only my miter saw was this easy and fool proof to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well built. Solid, thoughtful design and easy to move with or without the saw in place.
customer_reviews.author: House of Payne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best saw horses. this is a very good price also.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Peters

product_meta.title: DEWALT Miter Saw Stand, Heavy Duty with Miter Saw Mounting Brackets (DWX725B)
product_meta.description:
Heavy duty work stand, with miter saw mounting brackets, compact design, 36" wide, allows easy transport & storage, 1000 lb capacity each handles the toughest jobs, lightweight aluminum construction allows for easy transport to & from the jobsite, legs provide superior support & fold for easy storage, leg lock levers allow for fast & easy set up, transport latch allows pair of stands to be easily transported together, includes miter saw mounting brackets allowing use as a tool stand.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The DEWALT DWX725B Heavy duty work stand has a compact design that allows easy transport and storage. It has a 1000lb capacity (each) handles the toughest jobs. It has a lightweight aluminum construction (15.4 lbs.) that allows for easy transport to and from the jobsite. The legs provide superior support and fold for easy storage, and Leg Lock Levers allow for fast and easy set up. The Transport Latch allows pair of stands to be easily transported together. Includes DW7231 miter saw mounting brackets, allowing use as a tool stand.
feature_bullets: The product is easy to use
